headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  REED, BETSY MOOK

snippet: REED--Betsy Mook, died peacefully in Carlisle, PA, on June 13th, at the age of 99. Her son, Thomas Reed, Jr., and daughter-in-law, Dorothy Grant Reed, were at her bedside. Wife of Thomas Reed, Sr., Betsy graduated from Oberlin College in 1939. She taught crafts and apparel design in Providence, RI, for decades and spent her summers at Camp Pemigewassett in Wentworth, NH, where she produced and directed Gilbert and Sullivan operettas. She is survived by her son, Tom, her daughter, Penelope Doob, and her grandchildren, Abigail and Daniel Reed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: REED--Betsy Mook, died peacefully in Carlisle, PA, on June 13th, at the age of 99. Her son, Thomas Reed, Jr., and daughter-in-law, Dorothy Grant Reed, were at her bedside. Wife of Thomas Reed, Sr., Betsy graduated from Oberlin College in 1939. She taught crafts and apparel design in Providence, RI, for decades and spent her summers at Camp Pemigewassett in Wentworth, NH, where she produced and directed Gilbert and Sullivan operettas. She is survived by her son, Tom, her daughter, Penelope Doob, and her grandchildren, Abigail and Daniel Reed. 1/3
